message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY

The paper discusses the vulnerabilities and attacks in SDN-based networks, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed defense framework is based on machine learning, specifically reinforcement learning, which falls under the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The framework is designed to detect and mitigate attacks in network infrastructure, which falls under the category of network and internet architecture (cs.NI). Finally, the framework involves decision-making and optimization, which falls under the category of control systems (cs.SY).
